text: Shamkote railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Shamkote village, Khanewal district of Punjab province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Khanewal District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Shamkote railway station
